tagged_story_for_tts:
Seven Lanes of Thunder

Polished, spheres, whispering, to, the, ghost, of, perfect, strikes—
Fluorescent, arrows, bleeding, into, the, hymn, of, collapsing, pins—
Oiled, wood, singing, beneath, the, weight, of, a, falling, constellation—
Gutter, shadows, swallowing, the, echo, of, a, misaimed, prayer—
Fingers, clenched, around, fate’s, ten-frame, rosary, of, chance—
The, machine’s, growl, resurrects, the, bones, of, last, night’s, defeat—
A, split, left, hanging—like, a, question, carved, in, storm-light.
